attributes.review: The instructions were unclear and now a woman who goes by the name Karen is on my roof. She kept yelling at me saying I was on private property. She then jumped on me and bites me, now I have an undying urge to not mind my own business. After her biting me she roundhouses my 4 yr sister and uppercuts my dad into the roof. I was not trying to be rude but I accidentally pushed her out of the window and she got hit by a police car. After I tried to delete the app the FBI showed up n accused me of being an alien spy from mars. Now I am hiding from the law.... long story short don’t download the app it is very outrageous. Thank you for your time.
attributes.title: Instructions very unclear

attributes.review: ✨💫🧚‍♂️❤️This app made my fingers turn orange and cockroaches were crawling out of my phone that had ugly orange faces like this 🍊 my phone also kept glitching with a weird looking orange face very ✨scary✨ after that the roaches were trying to eat my toes and the orange face wants tiktok gone. Gen z will not be Silenced we are the best anyway this Cheeto oompah woompa app is horrible don’t get it if you don’t want orange ✨scary✨ faces on your phone and baby roaches that look just like the scary orange face to eat your toes also the face was so ugly I had a heart attack and I now have nightmares about it don’t recommend it at all 🧚‍♂️💫❤️✨
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♂️💫❤️Cheeto trumpa oompah app is horrible💫❤️✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.review: This app take over a week to download and when I opened it it didn’t even start up it’s on a white screen and stopped working. When I tried to re-download it after another week of downloading it opened and kept blasting obnoxious Music without stopping even when I close the app. Then my phone started getting weird glitches in it. I was freaking out and didn’t know what to do and shut my phone down when I turned it back on all my apps were gone. Even the messages it was just the Trump app like how could you break my phone so bad this is the worst app ever.
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: This is the number one WORST app ever. I can’t believe some would make an app about an orange like why would someone do something so terrible to human society like that 🥺...anyways when I tried to download the app my phone started to cry bc it was glitching THE APP MADE MY PHONE GLITCH and then I got a notification from my phone asking if i wanted to delete this terrible app and ofc I said yeah...but then all of a sudden a snake started to slither out of the app and I was like what’s going on and so I searched it up and it turns out that ONLY SNAKES 🐍 USE THIS APP and so then I deleted it... and this app is so gross 🤢🤢 but yeah that’s all I have to say☺️😊
attributes.title: WORST APP IN THE UNIVERSE!!!

attributes.review: Worst app I have EVER downloaded. As it was downloading the app, it had asked to take control of my screen. So I pressed ok and my screen went totally black so I couldn’t see. After my screen turned back on it then proceeded to flash Red ,white and blue for at least 20 mins. When the little light show was done I opened the app for it to then ask me to put in my credit card information. I put it in and proceeded to check out the app when i get a call from my bank the all of the money has been taken out of my account all but $0.69 cents. So disappointed don’t try the app.

Ok..where to start. First I am not a trump supporter and I hate this man with a burning passion. He is racist and homophobic and doesn’t believe in equal rights. I honestly don’t know what trump even made an app. I hope he doesn’t become president for another 4 more years. I could name many many reasons why I don’t like him because he is a cry baby that always just wants his way and just rambles on and only wants to do what he wants to do and fires people just because he feels like it. He is just a terrible “president” in general. I only did this because I am trying to help take down this app on ny behalf of tiktok.
attributes.title: Worst app ever dowbloaded

attributes.review: i’ve always been a HUGE trump supporter so when i saw he had an app i had to get it! i laid down in my trump 2020 blanket and prayed that all the black lives matter protesters went to jail while the app downloaded. then, horror struck. a ferocious pack of lions wearing mags hats stormed through my door. they ripped of my family’s heads and destroyed my room. i jumped on the lions back and rode it till i arrived at the white house. i was then kidnapped by the president himself and tortured for days in his bunker. he carved “fake news” into my left arm while screaming racial slurs. i write this review with my last dying breath, please don’t download this app.
attributes.title: this app is a disaster!!!

attributes.review:
I was sooo excited to get Mr. Hot Cheeto’s app 🥰. But strange things started happening and I started to find oranges 🍊🍊🍊all around my house!! It was a nightmare 👻 for me because I’m allergic to oranges 🍊😡‼️ It started to get worse and worse and I started to see orangey🍊 shadows out of the corner of my eye 👁 . And finally, Mr. Hot Cheeto man himself showed up in my room one night🌙 and started chasing after me 🏃🏼‍♀️🏃🏼‍♀️🏃🏼‍♀️. I quickly zoomed out of the way though and he accidentally ran through my window🤬😭‼️ When I looked 👀 outside the window again he was gone and didn’t even pay for itt👺😡😭‼️

Overall, awful app!! It’s super haunted👻👻👻
attributes.title: Ewwww yucky🍊🍊😡🤬👹👺🖕

attributes.review: When I went to browse through the app yk to see what it was all about and as I was scrolling through I kept on having weird symptoms like vomiting and massive headaches but I thought it was because I was on my phone to long so I set it down for a few hours and went and did something else until later that day I started hallucinating and feeling dizzy so I went to my doctor he said he wasn’t sure what it was but I should go to the hospital so I did and my doctor at the hospital said he thinks I have brain cancer soooooo long story short do not download this app because it gave me brain cancer

This app is absolutely horrible it took me almost a week to download and then wouldn’t stop bugging out when it did. I haven’t even been able to stay in the app for an full 5 minutes before it flashes like crazy. This app is so buggy and so not worth all the time I spent waiting around for it to download. You really need to put a flash warning on this app because many other reviews say it flashes too. I wasted my time with this app and other people as well. Hopefully people will read the reviews before trying to download this horrible app.
attributes.title: Horrible app do not waste your time!!
